ygData.subject: Re: Luini - weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it s great bards can wear chain/banded/etc. What looks more dashing than a suit of silver or gold=) As for weapons, I m not a big RPGer so I m going to
ygData.messageBody:
I think it's great bards can wear chain/banded/etc. What looks more
dashing than a suit of silver or gold=) As for weapons, I'm not a big
RPGer so I'm going to continue to use my mino axe until something better
comes along, like some kind of bard specific weapon( though I doubt
they'll have any because of our songs) On a side note What is the best
place for a 10th level bard to gain good money and decent exp. because I
am in the process of buying some banded armor.

Leland
Veeshan server
